textBox.richText: New paper on spoofing at BioSig 2012

We recently got a paper accepted at the next IEEE International Conference of the Biometrics Special Interest Group (BIOSIG) on Sept 06-07, 2012 in Darmstadt, Germany. “On the Effectiveness of Local Binary Patterns in Face Anti-spoofing”, Ivana Chingovska, André Anjos, Sébastien Marcel. Link: http://publications.idiap.ch/index.php/publications/show/2342
New paper on spoofing at BioSig 2012
